42801.name: Percentage of women 20-24 who were first married before 18 (UNICEF Global Databases (2016))
42801.description: Percentage of women aged 20 to 24 years who were first married or in union before age 18.

source.name: Child Marriage - UNICEF Global Databases (2016)
source.dataPublishedBy: UNICEF; Data and Analytics Section; Division of Data, Research and Policy
source.dataPublisherSource: DHS, MICS and other nationally representative surveys.
source.additionalInfo:
– The source notes that in some instances observations differ from the standard definition or refer to only part of a country. 

– The dates associated to each observation correspond to the end of the survey used as underlying source
